name: Totoro 64
overview: A studio Ghibli inspired fan game. Help Chu-Totoro catch the acorns before the timer expires. Run left and right to catch the falling acorns. Make sure you collect the set numbers of acorns needed before the time limit expires at the top of the screen. Then you will advance to the next stage. This game, despite its updates is still in preview mode and will be fully released soon.
